channel.title: Mezzyscape 508 v5 [New Pictures] / Videos / Holds 2k! || Need Suggestions!
channel.description:
Youtube Channel : http://www.youtube.com/isakilla1 I will post all updates there Subscribe :) Okay Well This is A project that I ended up Releasing So now is Time for Ver5 So i realized that everywhere i go... google, Moparscape, google, Rune-server, whatever is out there. All you see is 562-711 servers i seen that nobody makes 508's anymore and in 2008 when i joined rsps 508's where everywhere :) So i decided to make a Project on 508's so that Noobs can learn off it. [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=P6qBeT0xDfQ[/youtube] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9KD6MZlJRJ8&feature=relmfu[/youtube] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=90uyKJ4CxT4&feature=channel&list=UL[/youtube] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dBRYpbfSLJQ&feature=channel&list=UL[/youtube] Q/A What i want to get out of this I want to bring back all 508's back. What base will you use? Bulby is kinda glitchy so ill go with a Palidino76. Will you add Grand Exchange? Sure why not.. Will you care about leeches? I want this to be used more Than [Project Insanity] or Delta. So no Leeches will make me Happy :). New Pictures: [img]http://i.imgur.com/qaDWv.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/3tvzE.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/GFVCm.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/JylSi.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/QkeAv.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/TOfm0.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/3SSHH.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/ui7mY.png[/img] Old Pictures: [img]http://i42.tinypic.com/246mbeh.png[/img] [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/2ih155z.png[/img][img]http://i44.tinypic.com/2cffqqt.png[/img] [img]http://i44.tinypic.com/1zxsduo.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/MV6sL.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/5nzow.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/bShk8.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/wswxK.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/HD1Fn.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/w5mqy.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/D7lLp.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/NDnJx.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/z39mj.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/PSnbt.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/OASpK.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/oUcF8.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/8wFxb.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/frm9C.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/DYBVe.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/5Ltrb.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/xWnbS.png[/img] Update list: 2008 = Source was made :D May
5/8/2012 = Started this topic 5/8/2012 = Re-Setting up The Source in Eclipse 5/10/2012 = Fixed Construction Glitch 5/11/2012 = Attempting To Add Farming 5/11/2012 = New Website

item.description:
@Mezzyscape562 wrote:

[quote=“WowILikeToCode, post:18, topic:441687”][quote author=Mezzyscape562 link=topic=544375.msg3991609#msg3991609 date=1336663802]

Website Ty To Yanille 508… For Releasing.

Why not use Mike RS WEb, Much better and has built in CMS

edit: also i can code a few extra features too it like advanced signatures, More user profile options, avatars and BB Codes ect

I worked on this for like 2 days i cant go back…
[/quote]

You’d be able to do what you did with HTML in 2 days in about 30 mins or so with a CMS[/quote]
k ill look over it my friend is web developer and sent me it ty for suggestion
